message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the sale of this valuable product with you. I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to offer it to you for $12000.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9000. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

I understand you have a budget constraint, Bob. However, I believe the product's value to you is higher than $9000. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit. I'm now offering it to you for $11000.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above $11000. I'm willing to pay $10000 for the product, but that's as high as I can go.
